english_example_sentence: You supposedly read an interesting book in the library yesterday.
russian_example_sentence: Вы якобы прочитали интересную книгу в библиотеке вчера.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz dün kütüphanede ilginç bir kitap okumuşsunuz.
